name: Fit Girl - Workout & Dress Up
description:
Are you girls ready for a complete workout? And get the best body you want?
Not only the 9 different exercises are important to get a healthy body. Also the spa treatment after your workout can help you. After the very nice spa treatment where you can clean your face, do make up and do your hair.
After the spa treatment it’s time to create the most beautiful workout outfit. So combine shoes, hoodies, shirts, tank tops, leggings, accessory and many more.

Fit Girl: Workout & Dress Up is not only fun it's also educational to show children that exercises are good for your body!
In this fitness girl game you can choose 9 different mini games! Choose if you want to go spinning on a bike, rowing, halter weights lifting, do push ups and many more.

Join Jennifer in this fun day out and make it a really fun training workout session and enjoy this fitness girl game

Fun Fitness training workout Minigames:
* Weight Lifting
* Rowing
* Spinning
* Push Ups
* Jumping Rope
* Cardio

Features of Fit Girl: Workout & Dress Up
* Easy to play
* A lot of different mini training workout games to play
* Workout, Spa Treatment and dress up all in 1 game
* make Jennifer proud
* must play fit girl fitness girl game

We hope you will like this amazing fitness girl game and don't forget to give us the love by liking our Facebook page or follow us on twitter or Instagram, so we can keep you up to date on our fun mobile kids and girl games.
